mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODE_TB ( CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, BIGO, ORD, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( nextval('code_seq'), #{code_grp_id}, #{code_nm}, #{code_val}, #{bigo}, #{ord}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, BIGO, ORD, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_ID, USE_YN FROM CODE_TB WHERE CODE_GRP_ID = #{code_grp_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(ORD AS INTEGER) ASC
SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, BIGO, ORD, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_ID, USE_YN FROM CODE_TB WHERE CODE_ID = #{code_id}

SELECT A.CODE_ID, A.CODE_NM, A.CODE_VAL, A.CODE_GRP_ID FROM CODE_TB A, CODE_GRP_TB B WHERE A.CODE_GRP_ID = B.CODE_GRP_ID AND B.CODE_GRP_VAL = #{code_grp_val} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(A.ORD AS INTEGER) ASC
